data.title: Elements of Shakespeare Dramas in Recent Bollywood Movies
data.meta_description: Elements of Shakespeare Dramas in Recent Bollywood Movies - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document provides a summary of Bollywood movies that have been adapted from William Shakespeare's plays. It discusses three Shakespearean dramas - Macbeth, Othello, and Hamlet - and the corresponding Bollywood movies they inspired: Maqbool (2003), Omkara (2006), and Haider (2014). It provides plots of the original plays and compares characters between the plays and adapted movies. The document also provides background information on Shakespeare's dramas and the rise of Bollywood cinema.
